trans-unit.source: Specifies the file structure that will be used for the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener" /> log.
trans-unit.target: 指定将用于 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener" /> 日志的文件结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLogRetentionOption> enumeration is used to specify the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.TraceLogRetentionOption%2A> property in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLogRetentionOption>枚举用于指定的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.TraceLogRetentionOption%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener>类。

trans-unit.source: That property setting determines the possible and default values for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 属性设置确定的可能和默认值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A> properties through the `maximumFileSize` and `maximumNumberOfFiles` custom attributes in the configuration file or by using the `maximumFileSize` or `maximumNumberOfFiles` parameters in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A>属性通过`maximumFileSize`和`maximumNumberOfFiles`自定义特性在配置文件或使用`maximumFileSize`或`maximumNumberOfFiles`中的参数<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If the `maximumFileSize` or `maximumNumberOfFiles` attributes in the configuration file specify an out-of-range value, the properties are set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`maximumFileSize`或`maximumNumberOfFiles`配置文件中的属性中指定的范围外，属性将设置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: If you specify an out-of-range value in the `maximumFileSize` or `maximumNumberOfFiles` parameter when you call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A> constructor, an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定在超出范围值`maximumFileSize`或`maximumNumberOfFiles`参数在调用时<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>引发。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the possible and default values for file size and file count that are associated with each trace log retention option.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示对于文件大小和文件计数与每个跟踪日志保留选项相关联的可能和默认值。

trans-unit.source: "N/A" indicates that the associated property is not checked for that <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLogRetentionOption> value.
trans-unit.target: “N/A”表示未为该 <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceLogRetentionOption> 值检查关联的属性。

trans-unit.source: TraceLogRetentionOption
trans-unit.target: TraceLogRetentionOption

trans-unit.source: Maximum file size
trans-unit.target: 最大文件大小

trans-unit.source: Default file size
trans-unit.target: 默认文件大小

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of files
trans-unit.target: 最大文件数

trans-unit.source: Default number of files
trans-unit.target: 文件默认数量

trans-unit.source: LimitedCircularFiles
trans-unit.target: LimitedCircularFiles

trans-unit.source: N/A
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: N/A
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: LimitedSequentialFiles
trans-unit.target: LimitedSequentialFiles

trans-unit.source: 4 kB
trans-unit.target: 4 kB

trans-unit.source: N/A
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: SingleFileBoundedSize
trans-unit.target: SingleFileBoundedSize

trans-unit.source: 4 kB
trans-unit.target: 4 kB

trans-unit.source: N/A
trans-unit.target: 不可用

trans-unit.source: SingleFileUnboundedSize
trans-unit.target: SingleFileUnboundedSize

trans-unit.source: 4 kB
trans-unit.target: 4 kB

trans-unit.source: UnlimitedSequentialFiles
trans-unit.target: UnlimitedSequentialFiles

trans-unit.source: 4 kB
trans-unit.target: 4 kB

trans-unit.source: A finite number of sequential files, each with a maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 数量有限的顺序文件，每个文件均具有最大文件大小。

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize" /> property value is reached, writing starts in a new file with an incremented integer suffix.
trans-unit.target: 当达到 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize" /> 属性值时，即开始在带有递增整数后缀的新文件中写入。

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles" /> property value is reached, the first file is cleared and overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 当达到 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles" /> 属性值时，会清除和覆盖第一个文件。

trans-unit.source: Files are then incrementally overwritten in a circular manner.
trans-unit.target: 然后，会以循环方式逐渐覆盖这些文件。

trans-unit.source: A finite number of sequential files, each with a maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 数量有限的顺序文件，每个文件均具有最大文件大小。

trans-unit.source: When the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize" /> property value is reached, writing starts in a new file with an incremented integer suffix.
trans-unit.target: 当达到 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize" /> 属性值时，即开始在带有递增整数后缀的新文件中写入。

trans-unit.source: One file with a maximum file size that is determined by the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个最大文件大小由 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize" /> 属性确定的文件。

trans-unit.source: One file with no maximum file size restriction.
trans-unit.target: 一个没有最大文件大小限制的文件。

trans-unit.source: An unlimited number of sequential files, each with a maximum file size that is determined by the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 无限数量的顺序文件，每个文件的最大文件大小由 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize" /> 属性确定。

trans-unit.source: There is no logical bound to the number or size of the files, but it is limited by the physical constraints imposed by the computer.
trans-unit.target: 文件数量或大小没有逻辑上的约束，但受限于计算机强制的物理约束。
